title: Life is Beautiful
description: This heartwarming Italian film follows Guido, a Jewish man, who uses humor and imagination to protect his son from the horrors of a Nazi concentration camp during World War II.

title: I Am Legend
description: In a post-apocalyptic New York City, Dr. Robert Neville (Will Smith) is the last human survivor, trying to find a cure for a virus that wiped out humanity while battling infected, mutant creatures.
